product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 65 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegant banner is designed to promote premium jewelry, featuring a soft and luxurious aesthetic with centered product appeal. The background uses layered soft borders and wavy lineart to create depth, with a central light gradient circle that draws focus to the embedded product image at the center (`product_image`). The top section features two prominent headline text layers: a serif title (`heading`) and a sans-serif subtitle (`subheading`) providing a modern, classy hierarchy. A description block (`description`) states product highlights to the left of the product. Below that is a customer rating (`rating`) in smaller caps followed by bold, eye-catching price text (`price`). A strong, rounded-rectangle call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) anchors the design with a clear directive. 

**Color Palette**:
- Rose Pink: `#C25B5B`
- Soft Peach: `#FFF5F5`
- Delicate Red: `#DB8A8A`
- Deep Burgundy: `#7D3B3B`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Light Blush Accent: `#FFE8E8`, `#FFD0D0`, and `#F5D0D0`
product_color: The product image showcases elegant earrings combining a soft **rose gold** (#EFA7A7) hue with **clear white crystals** (#FFFFFF) and **brilliant diamond sparkle** (#D4E0E6). The rose gold forms the structure of the piece, subtly enveloping the crystals and pink enamel petal elements, enhancing the overall femininity and softness. The pink enamel (#FBBFC6) complements the rose gold, adding depth without overpowering the design. The seamless blending of metal and stones is enhanced by the strategic positioning of light reflections on the crystals, accentuating brilliance. For an advertisement banner, a soft blush pink background with rose gold accents and white minimal text will amplify the elegance.
